result.caption: Clicked in the terminal pane.
Ran the command "ls -l" in the terminal.
Switched to the file explorer pane and typed "t" to search for files.
Pressed Enter to open the selected file "summarize.py".
Pressed Cmd to hide the terminal window and switch to the desktop.
Opened the Files application.
Clicked "Other Locations" in the Files sidebar.
Clicked the "Enter server address..." input field.
Double-clicked the dropdown arrow to view recent server addresses.
Selected the recent server address "sftp://valentin.teutschbein..." from the dropdown list.
Clicked the "Connect" button.
Clicked "Close" on the "Unable to access location" error dialog.
Entered the server address "sftp://valentin.teutschbein@hpc.sci.hpi.de" and pressed Enter to connect.
Double-clicked to open the "lora-bp" folder.
Double-clicked to open the "repo" folder.
Double-clicked to open the "resources" folder.
Clicked to open the "jobs" folder.
Clicked the "Downloads" folder in the sidebar.
Clicked the "Documents" folder in the sidebar.
Double-clicked to open the "new" folder.
